page.title: 13WOMENS INSTITUTE.SOCIAL CLUB
page.content: BOTH HALE AND WOODGREEN HAVE AN ACTIVE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE WHICH MEETS MONTHLY,USUALLY WITH A GUEST SPEAKER. OUTINGS AND COMPETITIONS ARE ORGAN- ISED AND MONEY IS RAISED FOR CHARI- TIES. WOMEN'S INSTITUTES ALSO FORM AN IMPORTANT PRESSURE GROUP AND AT PRESENT THEY ARE CONCERNED WITH THE ACID RAIN CAUSED BY POLLUTION FROM FACTORIES_NOT ONLY FOR ITS EFFECT ON PEOPLE BUT ALSO ON PLANT AND ANIMAL LIFE. THEY ARE ALSO ACTIVE IN PRESSING FOR A POLICY TO HELP THE THIRD WORLD. EACH WEEK IN THE VILLAGE HALL THERE IS A SOCIAL AFTERNOON KNOWN AS THE "WEDNESDAY FORUM". IT IS OPEN TO ALL THE VILLAGERS; THEY ARE INVITED TO COME ALONG FOR A CUP OF TEA,A CHAT AND PERHAPS A GAME OF CARDS. TOYS ARE PROVIDED FOR THE CHILDREN. .
